attributes.action: Hold a referendum on the issue of Europe. As a people we must either fully embrace membership of the "superstate" or reject it and make our own way in the Global community
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A referendum was held on the "Common Market" a free trade area with our neighbours. No further mandate has been sought from the peoples of England, Scotland, Wales or Northern Ireland. The European Union has now grown beyond any recognition and successive governments have abdicated power and responsibility to faceless, unelected beaurocrats. Our choices are to either fully embrace the idea of joining with our neighbours to create a fully integrated entity or we reject the concept totally and leave the EU to manage our own affairs in their entirety. This is a decission that Must be made by the British people

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
